description:
**Problem**
REALTIME_PLAN ยง15.2 requires config for checkpoint groups, namespace defaults, and replication settings. Current config only includes auto_upgrade + limits; replication uses env vars and checkpoint groups are hard-coded to core.

Evidence:
- src/config.rs: Config has only auto_upgrade + limits.
- src/daemon/core.rs uses BD_REPL_LISTEN_ADDR / BD_REPL_MAX_CONNECTIONS env vars.
- src/daemon/checkpoint_scheduler.rs uses core_default only; no config-backed groups.

**Why this violates plan**
The plan explicitly calls out config-driven checkpoint groups and replication parameters. Missing config blocks real deployments and policy-driven behavior.

**Acceptance**
- [ ] Extend Config to include replication listen addr/peers/timeouts and checkpoint group definitions.
- [ ] Load namespace policy defaults from config or namespaces.toml as specified.
- [ ] Replace env-only replication settings with config precedence (env can override).
- [ ] Tests cover config roundtrip + defaulting.
title: Config additions missing for replication/checkpoint/namespace defaults
